comment:
* A font style object. * * This class represents a single font style which is a pair of weight value and slant value. * Here are common font styles examples: *

* 

 * 
 * final FontStyle NORMAL = new FontStyle(FONT_WEIGHT_NORMAL, FONT_SLANT_UPRIGHT);
 * final FontStyle BOLD = new FontStyle(FONT_WEIGHT_BOLD, FONT_SLANT_UPRIGHT);
 * final FontStyle ITALIC = new FontStyle(FONT_WEIGHT_NORMAL, FONT_SLANT_ITALIC);
 * final FontStyle BOLD_ITALIC = new FontStyle(FONT_WEIGHT_BOLD, FONT_SLANT_ITALIC);
 * 
 *
*

*

variables.name: FONT_WEIGHT_MIN
variables.comment: * A minimum weight value for the font

variables.name: FONT_WEIGHT_THIN
variables.comment: * A font weight value for the thin weight

variables.name: FONT_WEIGHT_EXTRA_LIGHT
variables.comment: * A font weight value for the extra-light weight

variables.name: FONT_WEIGHT_LIGHT
variables.comment: * A font weight value for the light weight

variables.name: FONT_WEIGHT_NORMAL
variables.comment: * A font weight value for the normal weight

variables.name: FONT_WEIGHT_MEDIUM
variables.comment: * A font weight value for the medium weight

variables.name: FONT_WEIGHT_SEMI_BOLD
variables.comment: * A font weight value for the semi-bold weight

variables.name: FONT_WEIGHT_BOLD
variables.comment: * A font weight value for the bold weight.

variables.name: FONT_WEIGHT_EXTRA_BOLD
variables.comment: * A font weight value for the extra-bold weight

variables.name: FONT_WEIGHT_BLACK
variables.comment: * A font weight value for the black weight

variables.name: FONT_WEIGHT_MAX
variables.comment: * A maximum weight value for the font

variables.name: FONT_SLANT_UPRIGHT
variables.comment: * A font slant value for upright

variables.name: FONT_SLANT_ITALIC
variables.comment: * A font slant value for italic

methods.name: public int getWeight()
methods.comment:
* Gets the weight value
      *
      * @see #FontStyle(int, int)
      * @return a weight value

methods.name: public int getSlant()
methods.comment:
* Gets the slant value
     *
     * @return a slant value

methods.name: public int getMatchScore(@NonNull FontStyle o)
methods.comment:
* Compute the matching score for another style.
     *
     * The smaller is better.
     * @hide
